articles.title: NASA's OSIRIS-REx mission flies by asteroid Bennu one final time - CNN
articles.description: A NASA spacecraft is conducting a final flyby of the asteroid Bennu on Wednesday, capturing images of the asteroid's surface from just 2.3 miles away. OSIRIS-REx's images should reveal the aftermath of its sample collection event in October.
